text: Lea and Darija () is a 2012 Croatian biographical film directed by Branko Ivanda. The film is based on the life of Lea Deutsch, a Jewish girl who was a dancing and acting star in Zagreb on the eve of World War II. == Cast == * Klara Naka as Lea Deutsch * Tamy Zajec as Darija Gasteiger * Zrinka Cvitešić as Ivka Deutsch * as Melita Gasteiger * Sebastian Cavazza as Stjepan Deutsch * as Tadija Kukic * Dražen Čuček as Tito Strozzi * Zijad Gračić as Dušan Žanko * Goran Grgić as Dubravko Dujšin * Radovan Ruždjak as Rod Riffler == References == == External links == * * Category:2012 biographical drama films Category:Croatian films Category:Croatian drama films Category:Holocaust films Category:World War II films based on actual events Category:Croatian biographical films Category:2012 drama films Category:Films set in Zagreb
title: Lea and Darija
